The older I get the more I realize one fact of life to be true: you can never have enough storage. Because of this (and well, because as a shopping editor it’s my job), I’m constantly on the lookout for stellar storage solutions, especially ones that won’t break the bank. As a small-space dweller myself, I’m particularly invested in finding pieces that can make the most of a tight space — this also means I heavily subscribe to the small-space philosophy of “think vertically.” Combining the two? That may just be my favorite thing. 

Now, one of the best places to score storage solutions on a budget is Walmart. Recently, while taking a scroll through its offerings I came across the BestOffice 4-Shelf Wire Unit, a knockout piece with over 3,800 five-star reviews. While this alone was enough to pique my interest, but the real kicker? This fan-favorite piece is currently on sale. 

What is the BestOffice 4-Shelf Wire Unit?

Featuring a durable metal construction, this storage shelf is the ultimate way to get your space in order without breaking the bank. Not only can this shelf hold up to 1,000 pounds, but it’s also adjustable, making it a versatile pick that truly can hold, well, anything. It’s also a breeze to put together (no tools required!) and its sleek look makes it a pick that can work in just about any room of your home. Oh, and did we mention it comes in your choice of either black or silver so you can really tailor your choice to your space?

What Walmart Shoppers Are Saying

“This shelf was better than I imagined. Very sturdy for what I paid for it and its shelving was perfect for what I needed it for. Very easy to put together. It is a great all-around shelving unit. Would purchase again and even might be purchasing another here in the next couple of weeks.” —Kathy

“These shelves are amazing and perfect for any room that you need shelving and or for organizing and storing things in the garage or sheds areas. Very sturdy and hold lots of weight. I would totally recommend to any and everyone.” —Tammy

“I bought this shelf to go in my pantry for extra shelving. I literally love it. It was so simple to put together. I am planning on buying another one to use on my screened in patio.” —bgilbreath
